panels.description: Percentage of CPU usage per service
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Average number of records consumed per second (per service and topic)

targets.expr: sum by(job, topic) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_consumed_rate{topic!~".*KSTREAM.*", topic!~".*KTABLE.*", topic!="token-events", topic=~".+"})

panels.title: Record Consumption Rate

panels.description: Average bytes consumed per second (per service and topic)

targets.expr: sum by(job, topic) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_bytes_consumed_rate{topic!~".*KSTREAM.*", topic!~".*KTABLE.*", topic!="token-events", topic=~".+"})

panels.title: Byte Consumption Rate

panels.description: Average time it took the server to respond to a request to a certain url. Only shows successful requests.
panels.title: Average HTTP Response TIme (Success)

panels.title: Total HTTP Requests
